page.title: 01Local
page.content: {Tiree is an island,where no trees grow {because ofthe sandy land and the {wind.Most of the land is used for {farming and crofting.The languages are {English and Gaelic.On Tiree there is {only one pier and one airpoirt. {Lately a radar station was built on {Ben Hough.The school is at Cornaig.On {the Reef three football teams play, {this year East won and Balemartin won {the five_a_side.Tiree is a very flat {island and only has a hill here and {there.The shops are small and they {do not have much choice.On page 15 {there is a page on the boat and on {page 16 there is the translation in {Gaelic.Page 19 is on discos and page {20 is the translation.
